question.text: You intend to turn left at the traffic lights. Just before turning you should

explanation.text: Check your nearside for cyclists before moving away. This is especially important if you have been in a stationary queue of traffic and are about to move off, as cyclists often try to filter past on the nearside of stationary vehicles.

answer.text: move close up to the white car
check for bicycles on your left
